blocks.name: clvec
blocks.content: Extend class notation with class of all left vector spaces.
blocks.origin: const class clvec { LVec }

blocks.name: diff.clvec.s
diff.clvec.c
diff.clvec.w
df-lvec
blocks.content: Define the class of all left vector spaces. A left vector space over a division ring is an Abelian group (vectors) together with a division ring (scalars) and a left scalar product connecting them. Some authors call this a "left module over a division ring", reserving "vector space" for those where the division ring is commutative, i.e., is a field. (Contributed by NM, 11-Nov-2013.)

blocks.name: islvec
blocks.content: The predicate "is a left vector space". (Contributed by NM, 11-Nov-2013.)

blocks.name: lvecdrng
blocks.content: The set of scalars of a left vector space is a division ring. (Contributed by NM, 17-Apr-2014.)

blocks.name: lveclmod
blocks.content: A left vector space is a left module. (Contributed by NM, 9-Dec-2013.)

blocks.name: lsslvec
blocks.content: A vector subspace is a vector space. (Contributed by NM, 14-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lsslvec(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clvec), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, clvec))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c0, cress, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clss, c0))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, clvec), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, clvec), wcel(c3, clmod), wcel(cfv(csca, c3), cdr))
  sylan(wcel(c0, clvec), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, clmod), wcel(c0, clmod))
  lveclmod(c0)
  lsslmod(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  eqeltrrd(cfv(csca, c3), cdr, cfv(csca, c0), wa(wcel(c0, clvec), wcel(c1, c2)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, clvec), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(csca, c0), cfv(csca, c3)))
  resssca(c1, c2, cfv(csca, c0), c3, c0)
  adantr(wcel(c0, clvec), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), cdr))
  lvecdrng(c0, cfv(csca, c0))
  eqid(cfv(csca, c0))
  islvec(c3, cfv(csca, c3))
  eqid(cfv(csca, c3))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lsslvec(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ LVec ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c3 ∈ LVec)
  ⊣ c3 =(c0[|`s]c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(LSubSp ` c0)
} = {
  sylanbrc((c0 ∈ LVec ∧ c1 ∈ c2), c3 ∈ LVec, c3 ∈ LMod, (Scalar ` c3)∈ DivRing)
  sylan(c0 ∈ LVec, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ LMod, c0 ∈ LMod)
  lveclmod(c0)
  lsslmod(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  eqeltrrd((Scalar ` c3), cdr, (Scalar ` c0), (c0 ∈ LVec ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  adantl(c0 ∈ LVec, c1 ∈ c2, (Scalar ` c0)=(Scalar ` c3))
  resssca(c1, c2, (Scalar ` c0), c3, c0)
  adantr(c0 ∈ LVec, c1 ∈ c2, (Scalar ` c0)∈ DivRing)
  lvecdrng(c0, (Scalar ` c0))
  eqid((Scalar ` c0))
  islvec(c3, (Scalar ` c3))
  eqid((Scalar ` c3))
}

blocks.name: lvecvs0or
blocks.content: If a scalar product is zero, one of its factors must be zero. ( ~ hvmul0or analog.) (Contributed by NM, 2-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm lvecvs0or(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), wo(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c3))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cvsca, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(csca, c6))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(cbs, c7))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c7))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
} = {
  impbid(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), wo(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c3)))
  ex(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), wo(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c3)))
  orrd(wa(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), c3)), wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c3))
  syl5bir(wa(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), c3)), wn(wceq(c0, c4)), wceq(c2, c3), wne(c0, c4))
  df-ne(c0, c4)
  ex(wa(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), c3)), wne(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c3))
  3eqtr3d(c2, c3, co(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c7), c0), c1, co(c0, c1, c2)), co(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c7), c0), c1, c3), wa(wa(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), c3)), wne(c0, c4)))
  ad2antlr(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), wne(c0, c4), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c7), c0), c1, co(c0, c1, c2)), co(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c7), c0), c1, c3)))
  oveq2(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, cfv(cfv(cinvr, c7), c0), c1)
  adantlr(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), wne(c0, c4), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c7), c0), c1, co(c0, c1, c2)), c2))
  3eqtr3d(co(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c7), c0), c1, co(c0, c1, c2)), c2, co(co(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c7), c0), cfv(cmulr, c7), c0), c1, c2), co(cfv(cur, c7), c1, c2), wa(w0, wne(c0, c4)))
  oveq1d(co(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c7), c0), cfv(cmulr, c7), c0), c1, c2, cfv(cur, c7), wa(w0, wne(c0, c4)))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wne(c0, c4)), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c7), c0), cfv(cmulr, c7), c0), cfv(cur, c7)), wcel(c7, cdr), wcel(c0, c8), wne(c0, c4))
  drnginvrl(c7, c0, c8, c4, cfv(cinvr, c7), cfv(cmulr, c7), cfv(cur, c7))
  syl13anc(wa(w0, wne(c0, c4)), wceq(co(co(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c7), c0), cfv(cmulr, c7), c0), c1, c2), co(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c7), c0), c1, co(c0, c1, c2))), wcel(c6, clmod), wcel(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c7), c0), c8), wcel(c0, c8), wcel(c2, c5))
  adantr(w0, wne(c0, c4), wcel(c6, clmod))
  adantr(w0, wne(c0, c4), wcel(c2, c5))
  lmodvsass(c6, cfv(cfv(cinvr, c7), c0), c8, c0, c2, c5, cfv(cmulr, c7), c1, c7)
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c7))
  adantr(w0, wne(c0, c4), wceq(co(cfv(cur, c7), c1, c2), c2))
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(cfv(cur, c7), c1, c2), c2), wcel(c6, clmod), wcel(c2, c5))
  lmodvs1(c6, c2, c5, cfv(cur, c7), c1, c7)
  eqid(cfv(cur, c7))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), c3)), wne(c0, c4)), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c7), c0), c1, c3), c3), wcel(c6, clmod), wcel(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c7), c0), c8))
  adantr(wa(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), c3)), wne(c0, c4), wcel(c6, clmod))
  adantr(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), wcel(c6, clmod))
  adantlr(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), wne(c0, c4), wcel(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c7), c0), c8))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wne(c0, c4)), wcel(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c7), c0), c8), wcel(c7, cdr), wcel(c0, c8), wne(c0, c4))
  syl(wa(w0, wne(c0, c4)), wcel(c7, cdr), wcel(c6, clvec))
  adantr(w0, wne(c0, c4), wcel(c6, clvec))
  lvecdrng(c6, c7)
  adantr(w0, wne(c0, c4), wcel(c0, c8))
  simpr(w0, wne(c0, c4))
  drnginvrcl(c7, c0, c8, c4, cfv(cinvr, c7))
  eqid(cfv(cinvr, c7))
  lmodvs0(c6, cfv(cfv(cinvr, c7), c0), c8, c1, c3, c7)
  jaod(w0, wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), c3))
  syl5ibrcom(w0, wceq(c0, c4), wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), wceq(co(c4, c1, c2), c3))
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(c4, c1, c2), c3), wcel(c6, clmod), wcel(c2, c5))
  lmod0vs(c6, c2, c5, c4, c1, c3, c7)
  eqeq1d(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, co(c4, c1, c2), wceq(c0, c4))
  oveq1(c0, c4, c1, c2)
  syl5ibrcom(w0, wceq(c2, c3), wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), wceq(co(c0, c1, c3), c3))
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c3), c3), wcel(c6, clmod), wcel(c0, c8))
  syl(w0, wcel(c6, clmod), wcel(c6, clvec))
  lveclmod(c6)
  lmodvs0(c6, c0, c8, c1, c3, c7)
  eqeq1d(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, co(c0, c1, c3), wceq(c2, c3))
  oveq2(c2, c3, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lvecvs0or(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0[c1]c2)= c3 ↔(c0 = c4 ∨ c2 = c3)))
  ⊣ c5 =(Base ` c6)
  ⊣ c1 =(× ` c6)
  ⊣ c7 =(Scalar ` c6)
  ⊣ c8 =(Base ` c7)
  ⊣ c4 =(0 ` c7)
  ⊣ c3 =(0 ` c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ LVec)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c8)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c5)
} = {
  impbid(w0, (c0[c1]c2)= c3, (c0 = c4 ∨ c2 = c3))
  ex(w0, (c0[c1]c2)= c3, (c0 = c4 ∨ c2 = c3))
  orrd((w0 ∧(c0[c1]c2)= c3), c0 = c4, c2 = c3)
  syl5bir((w0 ∧(c0[c1]c2)= c3), ¬ c0 = c4, c2 = c3, c0 ≠ c4)
  df-ne(c0, c4)
  ex((w0 ∧(c0[c1]c2)= c3), c0 ≠ c4, c2 = c3)
  3eqtr3d(c2, c3, (((invr ` c7)` c0)[c1](c0[c1]c2)), (((invr ` c7)` c0)[c1]c3), ((w0 ∧(c0[c1]c2)= c3)∧ c0 ≠ c4))
  ad2antlr(w0, (c0[c1]c2)= c3, c0 ≠ c4, (((invr ` c7)` c0)[c1](c0[c1]c2))=(((invr ` c7)` c0)[c1]c3))
  oveq2((c0[c1]c2), c3, ((invr ` c7)` c0), c1)
  adantlr(w0, (c0[c1]c2)= c3, c0 ≠ c4, (((invr ` c7)` c0)[c1](c0[c1]c2))= c2)
  3eqtr3d((((invr ` c7)` c0)[c1](c0[c1]c2)), c2, ((((invr ` c7)` c0)[(× ` c7)]c0)[c1]c2), ((1r ` c7)[c1]c2), (w0 ∧ c0 ≠ c4))
  oveq1d((((invr ` c7)` c0)[(× ` c7)]c0), c1, c2, (1r ` c7), (w0 ∧ c0 ≠ c4))
  syl3anc((w0 ∧ c0 ≠ c4), (((invr ` c7)` c0)[(× ` c7)]c0)=(1r ` c7), c7 ∈ DivRing, c0 ∈ c8, c0 ≠ c4)
  drnginvrl(c7, c0, c8, c4, (invr ` c7), (× ` c7), (1r ` c7))
  syl13anc((w0 ∧ c0 ≠ c4), ((((invr ` c7)` c0)[(× ` c7)]c0)[c1]c2)=(((invr ` c7)` c0)[c1](c0[c1]c2)), c6 ∈ LMod, ((invr ` c7)` c0)∈ c8, c0 ∈ c8, c2 ∈ c5)
  adantr(w0, c0 ≠ c4, c6 ∈ LMod)
  adantr(w0, c0 ≠ c4, c2 ∈ c5)
  lmodvsass(c6, ((invr ` c7)` c0), c8, c0, c2, c5, (× ` c7), c1, c7)
  eqid((× ` c7))
  adantr(w0, c0 ≠ c4, ((1r ` c7)[c1]c2)= c2)
  syl2anc(w0, ((1r ` c7)[c1]c2)= c2, c6 ∈ LMod, c2 ∈ c5)
  lmodvs1(c6, c2, c5, (1r ` c7), c1, c7)
  eqid((1r ` c7))
  syl2anc(((w0 ∧(c0[c1]c2)= c3)∧ c0 ≠ c4), (((invr ` c7)` c0)[c1]c3)= c3, c6 ∈ LMod, ((invr ` c7)` c0)∈ c8)
  adantr((w0 ∧(c0[c1]c2)= c3), c0 ≠ c4, c6 ∈ LMod)
  adantr(w0, (c0[c1]c2)= c3, c6 ∈ LMod)
  adantlr(w0, (c0[c1]c2)= c3, c0 ≠ c4, ((invr ` c7)` c0)∈ c8)
  syl3anc((w0 ∧ c0 ≠ c4), ((invr ` c7)` c0)∈ c8, c7 ∈ DivRing, c0 ∈ c8, c0 ≠ c4)
  syl((w0 ∧ c0 ≠ c4), c7 ∈ DivRing, c6 ∈ LVec)
  adantr(w0, c0 ≠ c4, c6 ∈ LVec)
  lvecdrng(c6, c7)
  adantr(w0, c0 ≠ c4, c0 ∈ c8)
  simpr(w0, c0 ≠ c4)
  drnginvrcl(c7, c0, c8, c4, (invr ` c7))
  eqid((invr ` c7))
  lmodvs0(c6, ((invr ` c7)` c0), c8, c1, c3, c7)
  jaod(w0, c0 = c4, c2 = c3, (c0[c1]c2)= c3)
  syl5ibrcom(w0, c0 = c4, (c0[c1]c2)= c3, (c4[c1]c2)= c3)
  syl2anc(w0, (c4[c1]c2)= c3, c6 ∈ LMod, c2 ∈ c5)
  lmod0vs(c6, c2, c5, c4, c1, c3, c7)
  eqeq1d((c0[c1]c2), c3, (c4[c1]c2), c0 = c4)
  oveq1(c0, c4, c1, c2)
  syl5ibrcom(w0, c2 = c3, (c0[c1]c2)= c3, (c0[c1]c3)= c3)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0[c1]c3)= c3, c6 ∈ LMod, c0 ∈ c8)
  syl(w0, c6 ∈ LMod, c6 ∈ LVec)
  lveclmod(c6)
  lmodvs0(c6, c0, c8, c1, c3, c7)
  eqeq1d((c0[c1]c2), c3, (c0[c1]c3), c2 = c3)
  oveq2(c2, c3, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: lvecvsn0
blocks.content: A scalar product is nonzero iff both of its factors are nonzero. (Contributed by NM, 3-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lvecvsn0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wne(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), wa(wne(c0, c4), wne(c2, c3))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cvsca, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(csca, c6))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(cbs, c7))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c7))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
} = {
  syl6bbr(w0, wne(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), wa(wne(c0, c4), wne(c2, c3)), wn(wo(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c3))))
  necon3abid(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, w0, wo(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c3)))
  lvecvs0or(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, c8, w0)
  neanior(c0, c4, c2, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lvecvsn0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0[c1]c2)≠ c3 ↔(c0 ≠ c4 ∧ c2 ≠ c3)))
  ⊣ c5 =(Base ` c6)
  ⊣ c1 =(× ` c6)
  ⊣ c7 =(Scalar ` c6)
  ⊣ c8 =(Base ` c7)
  ⊣ c4 =(0 ` c7)
  ⊣ c3 =(0 ` c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ LVec)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c8)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c5)
} = {
  syl6bbr(w0, (c0[c1]c2)≠ c3, (c0 ≠ c4 ∧ c2 ≠ c3), ¬(c0 = c4 ∨ c2 = c3))
  necon3abid((c0[c1]c2), c3, w0, (c0 = c4 ∨ c2 = c3))
  lvecvs0or(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, c8, w0)
  neanior(c0, c4, c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: lssvs0or
blocks.content: If a scalar product belongs to a subspace, either the scalar component is zero or the vector component also belongs to the subspace. (Contributed by NM, 5-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lssvs0or(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), wo(wceq(c0, c4), wcel(c2, c3))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cvsca, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(csca, c6))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(cbs, c7))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c7))
  -| wceq(c9, cfv(clss, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c9))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c8))
} = {
  impbida(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), wo(wceq(c0, c4), wcel(c2, c3)))
  orcomd(wa(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c3)), wceq(c0, c4), wcel(c2, c3))
  orrd(wa(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c3)), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(c0, c4))
  necon1bd(c0, c4, wa(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c3)), wcel(c2, c3))
  ex(wa(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c3)), wne(c0, c4), wcel(c2, c3))
  eqeltrd(c2, c3, co(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c7), c0), c1, co(c0, c1, c2)), wa(wa(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c3)), wne(c0, c4)))
  3eqtr3rd(c2, co(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c7), c0), c1, co(c0, c1, c2)), co(co(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c7), c0), cfv(cmulr, c7), c0), c1, c2), co(cfv(cur, c7), c1, c2), wa(wa(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c3)), wne(c0, c4)))
  oveq1d(co(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c7), c0), cfv(cmulr, c7), c0), c1, c2, cfv(cur, c7), wa(wa(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c3)), wne(c0, c4)))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c3)), wne(c0, c4)), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c7), c0), cfv(cmulr, c7), c0), cfv(cur, c7)), wcel(c7, cdr), wcel(c0, c8), wne(c0, c4))
  drnginvrl(c7, c0, c8, c4, cfv(cinvr, c7), cfv(cmulr, c7), cfv(cur, c7))
  syl13anc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c3)), wne(c0, c4)), wceq(co(co(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c7), c0), cfv(cmulr, c7), c0), c1, c2), co(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c7), c0), c1, co(c0, c1, c2))), wcel(c6, clmod), wcel(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c7), c0), c8), wcel(c0, c8), wcel(c2, c5))
  lmodvsass(c6, cfv(cfv(cinvr, c7), c0), c8, c0, c2, c5, cfv(cmulr, c7), c1, c7)
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c7))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c3)), wne(c0, c4)), wceq(co(cfv(cur, c7), c1, c2), c2), wcel(c6, clmod), wcel(c2, c5))

  lmodvsass(c6, cfv(c4, c1), c8, c1, c3, c5, cfv(cmulr, c7), c2, c7)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(cfv(cur, c7), c2, c3), c3), wcel(c6, clmod), wcel(c3, c5))
  lmodvs1(c6, c3, c5, cfv(cur, c7), c2, c7)
  sylan9eq(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), co(c1, c2, co(cfv(c4, c1), c2, c0)), w0, wceq(co(cfv(c4, c1), c2, c0), c3))
  3eqtr3rd(c0, co(c1, c2, co(cfv(c4, c1), c2, c0)), co(co(c1, cfv(cmulr, c7), cfv(c4, c1)), c2, c0), co(cfv(cur, c7), c2, c0), w0)

  syl3anc(w0, wcel(cfv(c4, c1), c8), wcel(c7, cdr), wcel(c1, c8), wne(c1, c9))
  syl(w0, wcel(c7, cdr), wcel(c6, clvec))
  lvecdrng(c6, c7)
  eldifad(c1, c8, csn(c9), w0)
  syl(w0, wne(c1, c9), wcel(c1, cdif(c8, csn(c9))))
  eldifsni(c1, c8, c9)
  drnginvrcl(c7, c1, c8, c9, c4)

thm lvecinv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 =(c1[c2]c3)↔ c3 =((c4 ` c1)[c2]c0)))
  ⊣ c5 =(Base ` c6)
  ⊣ c2 =(× ` c6)

  ⊣ c8 =(Base ` c7)
  ⊣ c9 =(0 ` c7)

  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈(c8 \ { c9 }))

} = {
  syl6bb(w0, c0 =(c1[c2]c3), c3 =((c4 ` c1)[c2]c0), ((c4 ` c1)[c2]c0)= c3)

  oveq2(c0, (c1[c2]c3), (c4 ` c1), c2)
  3eqtr3d(((c4 ` c1)[c2](c1[c2]c3)), c3, (((c4 ` c1)[(× ` c7)]c1)[c2]c3), ((1r ` c7)[c2]c3), w0)
  oveq1d(((c4 ` c1)[(× ` c7)]c1), c2, c3, (1r ` c7), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, ((c4 ` c1)[(× ` c7)]c1)=(1r ` c7), c7 ∈ DivRing, c1 ∈ c8, c1 ≠ c9)
  drnginvrl(c7, c1, c8, c9, c4, (× ` c7), (1r ` c7))
  syl13anc(w0, (((c4 ` c1)[(× ` c7)]c1)[c2]c3)=((c4 ` c1)[c2](c1[c2]c3)), c6 ∈ LMod, (c4 ` c1)∈ c8, c1 ∈ c8, c3 ∈ c5)
  lmodvsass(c6, (c4 ` c1), c8, c1, c3, c5, (× ` c7), c2, c7)

  3eqtr3rd(c0, (c1[c2]((c4 ` c1)[c2]c0)), ((c1[(× ` c7)](c4 ` c1))[c2]c0), ((1r ` c7)[c2]c0), w0)
  oveq1d((c1[(× ` c7)](c4 ` c1)), c2, c0, (1r ` c7), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, (c1[(× ` c7)](c4 ` c1))=(1r ` c7), c7 ∈ DivRing, c1 ∈ c8, c1 ≠ c9)
  drnginvrr(c7, c1, c8, c9, (× ` c7), c4, (1r ` c7))
  syl13anc(w0, ((c1[(× ` c7)](c4 ` c1))[c2]c0)=(c1[c2]((c4 ` c1)[c2]c0)), c6 ∈ LMod, c1 ∈ c8, (c4 ` c1)∈ c8, c0 ∈ c5)
  syl3anc(w0, (c4 ` c1)∈ c8, c7 ∈ DivRing, c1 ∈ c8, c1 ≠ c9)
  syl(w0, c7 ∈ DivRing, c6 ∈ LVec)
  lvecdrng(c6, c7)
  eldifad(c1, c8, { c9 }, w0)
  syl(w0, c1 ≠ c9, c1 ∈(c8 \ { c9 }))
  eldifsni(c1, c8, c9)
  drnginvrcl(c7, c1, c8, c9, c4)
  lmodvsass(c6, c1, c8, (c4 ` c1), c0, c5, (× ` c7), c2, c7)
  eqid((× ` c7))
  syl2anc(w0, ((1r ` c7)[c2]c0)= c0, c6 ∈ LMod, c0 ∈ c5)

blocks.name: lspsnvs
blocks.content: A nonzero scalar product does not change the span of a singleton. ( ~ spansncol analog.) (Contributed by NM, 23-Apr-2014.)

thm lspsnvs(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, clvec), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3)), wcel(c4, c5)), wceq(cfv(c6, csn(co(c1, c7, c4))), cfv(c6, csn(c4))))

  -| wceq(c8, cfv(csca, c0))

  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c8))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c8))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(clspn, c0))
} = {
  eqssd(cfv(c6, csn(co(c1, c7, c4))), cfv(c6, csn(c4)), w3a(wcel(c0, clvec), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3)), wcel(c4, c5)))

  lspsnvsi(c0, c1, c2, c4, c5, c6, c7, c8)
  eqsstr3d(cfv(c6, csn(c4)), cfv(c6, csn(co(c1, c7, c4))), cfv(c6, csn(co(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c8), c1), c7, co(c1, c7, c4)))), w3a(wcel(c0, clvec), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3)), wcel(c4, c5)))
  fveq2d(c6, csn(co(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c8), c1), c7, co(c1, c7, c4))), csn(c4), w3a(wcel(c0, clvec), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3)), wcel(c4, c5)))
  sneqd(co(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c8), c1), c7, co(c1, c7, c4)), c4, w3a(wcel(c0, clvec), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3)), wcel(c4, c5)))
  3eqtr3d(co(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c8), c1), c7, co(c1, c7, c4)), c4, co(co(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c8), c1), cfv(cmulr, c8), c1), c7, c4), co(cfv(cur, c8), c7, c4), w3a(wcel(c0, clvec), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3)), wcel(c4, c5)))
  oveq1d(co(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c8), c1), cfv(cmulr, c8), c1), c7, c4, cfv(cur, c8), w3a(wcel(c0, clvec), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3)), wcel(c4, c5)))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, clvec), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3)), wcel(c4, c5)), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c8), c1), cfv(cmulr, c8), c1), cfv(cur, c8)), wcel(c8, cdr), wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3))
  drnginvrl(c8, c1, c2, c3, cfv(cinvr, c8), cfv(cmulr, c8), cfv(cur, c8))
  syl13anc(w3a(wcel(c0, clvec), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3)), wcel(c4, c5)), wceq(co(co(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c8), c1), cfv(cmulr, c8), c1), c7, c4), co(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c8), c1), c7, co(c1, c7, c4))), wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c8), c1), c2), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c5))
  lmodvsass(c0, cfv(cfv(cinvr, c8), c1), c2, c1, c4, c5, cfv(cmulr, c8), c7, c8)
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c8))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, clvec), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3)), wcel(c4, c5)), wceq(co(cfv(cur, c8), c7, c4), c4), wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c4, c5))
  lmodvs1(c0, c4, c5, cfv(cur, c8), c7, c8)
  eqid(cfv(cur, c8))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, clvec), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3)), wcel(c4, c5)), wss(cfv(c6, csn(co(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c8), c1), c7, co(c1, c7, c4)))), cfv(c6, csn(co(c1, c7, c4)))), wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c8), c1), c2), wcel(co(c1, c7, c4), c5))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, clvec), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3)), wcel(c4, c5)), wcel(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c8), c1), c2), wcel(c8, cdr), wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, clvec), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3)), wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c8, cdr))
  lvecdrng(c0, c8)
  simp2r(wcel(c0, clvec), wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3), wcel(c4, c5))
  drnginvrcl(c8, c1, c2, c3, cfv(cinvr, c8))
  eqid(cfv(cinvr, c8))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, clvec), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3)), wcel(c4, c5)), wcel(co(c1, c7, c4), c5), wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c5))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, clvec), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3)), wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c0, clmod))
  lveclmod(c0)
  simp2l(wcel(c0, clvec), wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3), wcel(c4, c5))
  simp3(wcel(c0, clvec), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3)), wcel(c4, c5))
  lmodvscl(c0, c1, c2, c4, c5, c7, c8)

thm lspsnvs(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ LVec ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ≠ c3)∧ c4 ∈ c5)→(c6 ` {(c1[c7]c4)})=(c6 ` { c4 }))

  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c8)
  ⊣ c3 =(0 ` c8)

} = {
  eqssd((c6 ` {(c1[c7]c4)}), (c6 ` { c4 }), (c0 ∈ LVec ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ≠ c3)∧ c4 ∈ c5))
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ LVec ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ≠ c3)∧ c4 ∈ c5), (c6 ` {(c1[c7]c4)})⊆(c6 ` { c4 }), c0 ∈ LMod, c1 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c5)

  eqsstr3d((c6 ` { c4 }), (c6 ` {(c1[c7]c4)}), (c6 ` {(((invr ` c8)` c1)[c7](c1[c7]c4))}), (c0 ∈ LVec ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ≠ c3)∧ c4 ∈ c5))
  fveq2d(c6, {(((invr ` c8)` c1)[c7](c1[c7]c4))}, { c4 }, (c0 ∈ LVec ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ≠ c3)∧ c4 ∈ c5))
  sneqd((((invr ` c8)` c1)[c7](c1[c7]c4)), c4, (c0 ∈ LVec ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ≠ c3)∧ c4 ∈ c5))
  3eqtr3d((((invr ` c8)` c1)[c7](c1[c7]c4)), c4, ((((invr ` c8)` c1)[(× ` c8)]c1)[c7]c4), ((1r ` c8)[c7]c4), (c0 ∈ LVec ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ≠ c3)∧ c4 ∈ c5))
  oveq1d((((invr ` c8)` c1)[(× ` c8)]c1), c7, c4, (1r ` c8), (c0 ∈ LVec ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ≠ c3)∧ c4 ∈ c5))
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ LVec ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ≠ c3)∧ c4 ∈ c5), (((invr ` c8)` c1)[(× ` c8)]c1)=(1r ` c8), c8 ∈ DivRing, c1 ∈ c2, c1 ≠ c3)
  drnginvrl(c8, c1, c2, c3, (invr ` c8), (× ` c8), (1r ` c8))
  syl13anc((c0 ∈ LVec ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ≠ c3)∧ c4 ∈ c5), ((((invr ` c8)` c1)[(× ` c8)]c1)[c7]c4)=(((invr ` c8)` c1)[c7](c1[c7]c4)), c0 ∈ LMod, ((invr ` c8)` c1)∈ c2, c1 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c5)
  lmodvsass(c0, ((invr ` c8)` c1), c2, c1, c4, c5, (× ` c8), c7, c8)
  eqid((× ` c8))
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ LVec ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ≠ c3)∧ c4 ∈ c5), ((1r ` c8)[c7]c4)= c4, c0 ∈ LMod, c4 ∈ c5)
  lmodvs1(c0, c4, c5, (1r ` c8), c7, c8)
  eqid((1r ` c8))
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ LVec ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ≠ c3)∧ c4 ∈ c5), (c6 ` {(((invr ` c8)` c1)[c7](c1[c7]c4))})⊆(c6 ` {(c1[c7]c4)}), c0 ∈ LMod, ((invr ` c8)` c1)∈ c2, (c1[c7]c4)∈ c5)
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ LVec ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ≠ c3)∧ c4 ∈ c5), ((invr ` c8)` c1)∈ c2, c8 ∈ DivRing, c1 ∈ c2, c1 ≠ c3)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ∈ LVec, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ≠ c3), c4 ∈ c5, c8 ∈ DivRing)
  lvecdrng(c0, c8)

thm lspsneleq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c2))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c4))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(clspn, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(c0, csn(c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c1, c5))
} = {
  mpd(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c2))), wcel(c1, cfv(c0, csn(c2))))
  sylbid(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(c0, csn(c2))), wceq(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c2))), wrex(hs0, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c4)), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cvsca, c4), c2))))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wcel(c1, cfv(c0, csn(c2))), wrex(hs0, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c4)), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cvsca, c4), c2)))), wcel(c4, clmod), wcel(c2, c3))
  lspsnel(hs0, c4, c2, c3, c1, c0, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c4)), cfv(cvsca, c4), cfv(csca, c4))
  rexlimdva2(hs0, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c4)), w0, wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cvsca, c4), c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c2))))
  eqtrd(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c2)), cfv(c0, csn(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cvsca, c4), c2))), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c4)))), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cvsca, c4), c2))))
  fveq2d(c0, csn(c1), csn(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cvsca, c4), c2)), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c4)))), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cvsca, c4), c2))))
  sneqd(c1, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cvsca, c4), c2), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c4)))), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cvsca, c4), c2))))
  simpr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c4)))), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cvsca, c4), c2)))

thm lspsneleq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ` { c1 })=(c0 ` { c2 }))

  mpd(w0, (c0 ` { c1 })=(c0 ` { c2 }), c1 ∈(c0 ` { c2 }))
  sylbid(w0, c1 ∈(c0 ` { c2 }), (c0 ` { c1 })=(c0 ` { c2 }), ∃(hs0 ∈(Base `(Scalar ` c4)), c1 =(hs0[(× ` c4)]c2)))
  syl2anc(w0, (c1 ∈(c0 ` { c2 })↔ ∃(hs0 ∈(Base `(Scalar ` c4)), c1 =(hs0[(× ` c4)]c2))), c4 ∈ LMod, c2 ∈ c3)
  lspsnel(hs0, c4, c2, c3, c1, c0, (Base `(Scalar ` c4)), (× ` c4), (Scalar ` c4))
  rexlimdva2(hs0, (Base `(Scalar ` c4)), w0, c1 =(hs0[(× ` c4)]c2), (c0 ` { c1 })=(c0 ` { c2 }))
  eqtrd((c0 ` { c1 }), (c0 ` { c2 }), (c0 ` {(hs0[(× ` c4)]c2)}), ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(Base `(Scalar ` c4)))∧ c1 =(hs0[(× ` c4)]c2)))
  fveq2d(c0, { c1 }, {(hs0[(× ` c4)]c2)}, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(Base `(Scalar ` c4)))∧ c1 =(hs0[(× ` c4)]c2)))
  sneqd(c1, (hs0[(× ` c4)]c2), ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(Base `(Scalar ` c4)))∧ c1 =(hs0[(× ` c4)]c2)))
  simpr((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(Base `(Scalar ` c4))), c1 =(hs0[(× ` c4)]c2))
  syl121anc(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(Base `(Scalar ` c4)))∧ c1 =(hs0[(× ` c4)]c2)), (c0 ` {(hs0[(× ` c4)]c2)})=(c0 ` { c2 }), c4 ∈ LVec, hs0 ∈(Base `(Scalar ` c4)), hs0 ≠(0 `(Scalar ` c4)), c2 ∈ c3)
  ad2antrr(w0, hs0 ∈(Base `(Scalar ` c4)), c1 =(hs0[(× ` c4)]c2), c4 ∈ LVec)
  simplr(w0, hs0 ∈(Base `(Scalar ` c4)), c1 =(hs0[(× ` c4)]c2))
  mpd(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(Base `(Scalar ` c4)))∧ c1 =(hs0[(× ` c4)]c2)), hs0 ≠(0 `(Scalar ` c4)), c1 ≠ c5)
  ad2antrr(w0, hs0 ∈(Base `(Scalar ` c4)), c1 =(hs0[(× ` c4)]c2), c1 ≠ c5)
  necon3d(c1, c5, hs0, (0 `(Scalar ` c4)), ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(Base `(Scalar ` c4)))∧ c1 =(hs0[(× ` c4)]c2)))
  ex(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(Base `(Scalar ` c4)))∧ c1 =(hs0[(× ` c4)]c2)), hs0 =(0 `(Scalar ` c4)), c1 = c5)
  3eqtrd(c1, c5, (hs0[(× ` c4)]c2), ((0 `(Scalar ` c4))[(× ` c4)]c2), (((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(Base `(Scalar ` c4)))∧ c1 =(hs0[(× ` c4)]c2))∧ hs0 =(0 `(Scalar ` c4))))
  simplr((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(Base `(Scalar ` c4))), c1 =(hs0[(× ` c4)]c2), hs0 =(0 `(Scalar ` c4)))
  oveq1d(hs0, (× ` c4), c2, (0 `(Scalar ` c4)), (((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(Base `(Scalar ` c4)))∧ c1 =(hs0[(× ` c4)]c2))∧ hs0 =(0 `(Scalar ` c4))))
  simpr(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(Base `(Scalar ` c4)))∧ c1 =(hs0[(× ` c4)]c2)), hs0 =(0 `(Scalar ` c4)))
  ad3antrrr(w0, hs0 ∈(Base `(Scalar ` c4)), c1 =(hs0[(× ` c4)]c2), hs0 =(0 `(Scalar ` c4)), ((0 `(Scalar ` c4))[(× ` c4)]c2)= c5)
  syl2anc(w0, ((0 `(Scalar ` c4))[(× ` c4)]c2)= c5, c4 ∈ LMod, c2 ∈ c3)
  syl(w0, c4 ∈ LMod, c4 ∈ LVec)
  lveclmod(c4)

blocks.name: lspsncmp
blocks.content: Comparable spans of nonzero singletons are equal. (Contributed by NM, 27-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lspsncmp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wss(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c2))), wceq(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c2)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c4))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(clspn, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cdif(c3, csn(c5))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
} = {
  impbid1(w0, wss(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c2))), wceq(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c2))))
  ex(w0, wss(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c2))), wceq(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c2))))
  lspsneleq(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, wa(w0, wss(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c2)))))
  adantr(w0, wss(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c2))), wcel(c4, clvec))
  adantr(w0, wss(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c2))), wcel(c2, c3))
  biimpar(w0, wss(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c2))), wcel(c1, cfv(c0, csn(c2))))
  lspsnel5(c1, cfv(c0, csn(c2)), c0, c3, c4, cfv(clss, c4), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, csn(c2)), cfv(clss, c4)), wcel(c4, clmod), wcel(c2, c3))
  syl(w0, wcel(c4, clmod), wcel(c4, clvec))
  lveclmod(c4)
  lspsncl(c4, c2, c3, c0, cfv(clss, c4))
  eqid(cfv(clss, c4))
  eldifad(c1, c3, csn(c5), w0)
  adantr(w0, wss(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c2))), wne(c1, c5))
  syl(w0, wne(c1, c5), wcel(c1, cdif(c3, csn(c5))))
  eldifsni(c1, c3, c5)
  eqimss(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c2)))
}

thm lspsncmp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0 ` { c1 })⊆(c0 ` { c2 })↔(c0 ` { c1 })=(c0 ` { c2 })))
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c4)

} = {
  impbid1(w0, (c0 ` { c1 })⊆(c0 ` { c2 }), (c0 ` { c1 })=(c0 ` { c2 }))
  ex(w0, (c0 ` { c1 })⊆(c0 ` { c2 }), (c0 ` { c1 })=(c0 ` { c2 }))
  lspsneleq(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, (w0 ∧(c0 ` { c1 })⊆(c0 ` { c2 })))
  adantr(w0, (c0 ` { c1 })⊆(c0 ` { c2 }), c4 ∈ LVec)
  adantr(w0, (c0 ` { c1 })⊆(c0 ` { c2 }), c2 ∈ c3)
  biimpar(w0, (c0 ` { c1 })⊆(c0 ` { c2 }), c1 ∈(c0 ` { c2 }))
  lspsnel5(c1, (c0 ` { c2 }), c0, c3, c4, (LSubSp ` c4), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ` { c2 })∈(LSubSp ` c4), c4 ∈ LMod, c2 ∈ c3)
  syl(w0, c4 ∈ LMod, c4 ∈ LVec)
  lveclmod(c4)
  lspsncl(c4, c2, c3, c0, (LSubSp ` c4))
  eqid((LSubSp ` c4))
  eldifad(c1, c3, { c5 }, w0)
  adantr(w0, (c0 ` { c1 })⊆(c0 ` { c2 }), c1 ≠ c5)
  syl(w0, c1 ≠ c5, c1 ∈(c3 \ { c5 }))
  eldifsni(c1, c3, c5)
  eqimss((c0 ` { c1 }), (c0 ` { c2 }))
}

thm lspsnne1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wn(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, csn(c2)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(clspn, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdif(c3, csn(c5))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wne(cfv(c1, csn(c0)), cfv(c1, csn(c2))))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wn(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, csn(c2)))), wne(cfv(c1, csn(c0)), cfv(c1, csn(c2))))
  bitrd(w0, wn(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, csn(c2)))), wne(cfv(c1, csn(c0)), cfv(c1, csn(c2))), wn(wss(cfv(c1, csn(c0)), cfv(c1, csn(c2)))))
  notbid(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(c1, csn(c2))), wss(cfv(c1, csn(c0)), cfv(c1, csn(c2))))
  lspsnel5(c0, cfv(c1, csn(c2)), c1, c3, c4, cfv(clss, c4), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cfv(c1, csn(c2)), cfv(clss, c4)), wcel(c4, clmod), wcel(c2, c3))
  syl(w0, wcel(c4, clmod), wcel(c4, clvec))
  lveclmod(c4)
  lspsncl(c4, c2, c3, c1, cfv(clss, c4))
  eqid(cfv(clss, c4))
  eldifad(c0, c3, csn(c5), w0)
  necon3bbid(cfv(c1, csn(c0)), cfv(c1, csn(c2)), w0, wss(cfv(c1, csn(c0)), cfv(c1, csn(c2))))
  lspsncmp(c1, c0, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
}

thm lspsnne1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ¬ c0 ∈(c1 ` { c2 }))

} = {

  bitrd(w0, ¬ c0 ∈(c1 ` { c2 }), (c1 ` { c0 })≠(c1 ` { c2 }), ¬(c1 ` { c0 })⊆(c1 ` { c2 }))
  notbid(w0, c0 ∈(c1 ` { c2 }), (c1 ` { c0 })⊆(c1 ` { c2 }))

}

blocks.name: lspsnnecom
blocks.content: Swap two vectors with different spans. (Contributed by NM, 20-May-2015.)

thm lspsnnecom(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wn(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, csn(c2)))))

  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c4))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdif(c3, csn(c5))))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c2, cfv(c1, csn(c0)))))
} = {
  lspsnne1(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  necomd(cfv(c1, csn(c0)), cfv(c1, csn(c2)), w0)

  syl(w0, wcel(c4, clmod), wcel(c4, clvec))
  lveclmod(c4)
  eldifad(c0, c3, csn(c5), w0)

thm lspsnnecom(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ¬ c0 ∈(c1 ` { c2 }))
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c4)
  ⊣ c5 =(0 ` c4)
  ⊣ c1 =(LSpan ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ LVec)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(c3 \ { c5 }))
  ⊣ (w0 → ¬ c2 ∈(c1 ` { c0 }))
} = {
  lspsnne1(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  necomd((c1 ` { c0 }), (c1 ` { c2 }), w0)
  lspsnne2(c1, c2, c0, c3, c4, w0)
  syl(w0, c4 ∈ LMod, c4 ∈ LVec)
  lveclmod(c4)
  eldifad(c0, c3, { c5 }, w0)

thm lspabs2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c2))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cplusg, c4))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(c0g, c4))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(clspn, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cdif(c3, csn(c6))))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(co(c1, c5, c2)))))
} = {
  eqcomd(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c2)), w0)
  mpbid(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, csn(c2)), cfv(c0, csn(c1))), wss(cfv(c0, csn(c2)), cfv(c0, csn(c1))))
  sseqtrd(cfv(c0, csn(c2)), cfv(c0, csn(c1)), co(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(clsm, c4), cfv(c0, csn(c2))), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wss(cfv(c0, csn(c2)), co(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(clsm, c4), cfv(c0, csn(c2)))), wcel(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(csubg, c4)), wcel(cfv(c0, csn(c2)), cfv(csubg, c4)))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, csn(c2)), cfv(csubg, c4)), wcel(c4, clmod), wcel(c2, c3))
  lspsnsubg(c4, c2, c3, c0)
  lsmub2(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), c4, cfv(c0, csn(c2)), cfv(clsm, c4))
  3eqtr3rd(co(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(clsm, c4), cfv(c0, csn(c2))), cfv(c0, csn(c1)), co(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(clsm, c4), cfv(c0, csn(c1))), co(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(clsm, c4), cfv(c0, csn(co(c1, c5, c2)))), w0)
  oveq2d(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(clsm, c4), cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(co(c1, c5, c2))), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(co(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(clsm, c4), cfv(c0, csn(c1))), cfv(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(csubg, c4)))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(csubg, c4)), wcel(c4, clmod), wcel(c1, c3))
  lspsnsubg(c4, c1, c3, c0)
  lsmidm(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), c4, cfv(clsm, c4))
  3eqtr3d(co(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(clsm, c4), cfv(c0, csn(co(c1, c5, c2)))), co(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(clsm, c4), cfv(c0, csn(c2))), cfv(c0, cpr(c1, co(c1, c5, c2))), cfv(c0, cpr(c1, c2)), w0)
  lspprabs(c0, c1, c5, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  lsmpr(c0, c1, co(c1, c5, c2), cfv(clsm, c4), c3, c4, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(co(c1, c5, c2), c3), wcel(c4, clmod), wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3))
  lmodvacl(c4, c1, c3, c2, c5)
  lsmpr(c0, c1, c2, cfv(clsm, c4), c3, c4, w0)
  eqid(cfv(clsm, c4))
  syl(w0, wcel(c4, clmod), wcel(c4, clvec))
  lveclmod(c4)
  eldifad(c2, c3, csn(c6), w0)
  lspsncmp(c0, c2, c1, c3, c4, c6, w0)

thm lspabs2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ` { c1 })=(c0 ` { c2 }))
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c4)
  ⊣ c5 =(+ ` c4)
  ⊣ c6 =(0 ` c4)
  ⊣ c0 =(LSpan ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ LVec)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈(c3 \ { c6 }))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 ` { c1 })=(c0 ` {(c1[c5]c2)}))
} = {
  eqcomd((c0 ` { c1 }), (c0 ` { c2 }), w0)
  mpbid(w0, (c0 ` { c2 })=(c0 ` { c1 }), (c0 ` { c2 })⊆(c0 ` { c1 }))
  sseqtrd((c0 ` { c2 }), (c0 ` { c1 }), ((c0 ` { c1 })[(LSSum ` c4)](c0 ` { c2 })), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ` { c2 })⊆((c0 ` { c1 })[(LSSum ` c4)](c0 ` { c2 })), (c0 ` { c1 })∈(SubGrp ` c4), (c0 ` { c2 })∈(SubGrp ` c4))
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ` { c2 })∈(SubGrp ` c4), c4 ∈ LMod, c2 ∈ c3)
  lspsnsubg(c4, c2, c3, c0)
  lsmub2((c0 ` { c1 }), c4, (c0 ` { c2 }), (LSSum ` c4))
  3eqtr3rd(((c0 ` { c1 })[(LSSum ` c4)](c0 ` { c2 })), (c0 ` { c1 }), ((c0 ` { c1 })[(LSSum ` c4)](c0 ` { c1 })), ((c0 ` { c1 })[(LSSum ` c4)](c0 ` {(c1[c5]c2)})), w0)
  oveq2d((c0 ` { c1 }), (LSSum ` c4), (c0 ` { c1 }), (c0 ` {(c1[c5]c2)}), w0)
  syl(w0, ((c0 ` { c1 })[(LSSum ` c4)](c0 ` { c1 }))=(c0 ` { c1 }), (c0 ` { c1 })∈(SubGrp ` c4))
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ` { c1 })∈(SubGrp ` c4), c4 ∈ LMod, c1 ∈ c3)
  lspsnsubg(c4, c1, c3, c0)
  lsmidm((c0 ` { c1 }), c4, (LSSum ` c4))
  3eqtr3d(((c0 ` { c1 })[(LSSum ` c4)](c0 ` {(c1[c5]c2)})), ((c0 ` { c1 })[(LSSum ` c4)](c0 ` { c2 })), (c0 ` { c1,(c1[c5]c2)}), (c0 ` { c1, c2 }), w0)
  lspprabs(c0, c1, c5, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  lsmpr(c0, c1, (c1[c5]c2), (LSSum ` c4), c3, c4, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, (c1[c5]c2)∈ c3, c4 ∈ LMod, c1 ∈ c3, c2 ∈ c3)
  lmodvacl(c4, c1, c3, c2, c5)
  lsmpr(c0, c1, c2, (LSSum ` c4), c3, c4, w0)
  eqid((LSSum ` c4))
  syl(w0, c4 ∈ LMod, c4 ∈ LVec)
  lveclmod(c4)
  eldifad(c2, c3, { c6 }, w0)
  lspsncmp(c0, c2, c1, c3, c4, c6, w0)
}

thm lspabs3(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {

  lspsnel5a(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), co(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(clsm, c5), cfv(c0, csn(c3))), cfv(clss, c5), c5, w0)

  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(clss, c5)), wcel(c5, clmod), wcel(c1, c4))

  lspsncl(c5, c3, c4, c0, cfv(clss, c5))
  lsmcl(c5, cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(clss, c5), cfv(c0, csn(c3)), cfv(clsm, c5))
  eqid(cfv(clss, c5))
  syl22anc(w0, wcel(co(c1, c2, c3), co(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(clsm, c5), cfv(c0, csn(c3)))), wcel(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(csubg, c5)), wcel(cfv(c0, csn(c3)), cfv(csubg, c5)), wcel(c1, cfv(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(c3, cfv(c0, csn(c3))))
  eqeltrrd(cfv(c0, csn(c3)), cfv(csubg, c5), cfv(c0, csn(c1)), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(c5, clmod), wcel(c1, c4))
  lspsnid(c5, c1, c4, c0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(c0, csn(c3))), wcel(c5, clmod), wcel(c3, c4))
  lspsnid(c5, c3, c4, c0)
  lsmelvali(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), c5, cfv(c0, csn(c3)), c1, c3, c2, cfv(clsm, c5))
  eqtr3d(co(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(clsm, c5), cfv(c0, csn(c3))), cfv(c0, csn(c1)), co(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(clsm, c5), cfv(c0, csn(c1))), w0)
  oveq2d(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(clsm, c5), cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c3)), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(co(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(clsm, c5), cfv(c0, csn(c1))), cfv(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(csubg, c5)))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(csubg, c5)), wcel(c5, clmod), wcel(c1, c4))
  lspsnsubg(c5, c1, c4, c0)
  lsmidm(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), c5, cfv(clsm, c5))
  eqid(cfv(clsm, c5))
  lspsncmp(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), c1, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  sylanbrc(w0, wcel(co(c1, c2, c3), cdif(c4, csn(c6))), wcel(co(c1, c2, c3), c4), wne(co(c1, c2, c3), c6))
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(co(c1, c2, c3), c4), wcel(c5, clmod), wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c3, c4))
  syl(w0, wcel(c5, clmod), wcel(c5, clvec))
  lveclmod(c5)
  lmodvacl(c5, c1, c4, c3, c2)
  eldifsn(co(c1, c2, c3), c4, c6)

  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ` { c1 })=(c0 ` {(c1[c2]c3)}))

  eqeltrrd((c0 ` { c3 }), (SubGrp ` c5), (c0 ` { c1 }), w0)

  eqtr3d(((c0 ` { c1 })[(LSSum ` c5)](c0 ` { c3 })), (c0 ` { c1 }), ((c0 ` { c1 })[(LSSum ` c5)](c0 ` { c1 })), w0)
  oveq2d((c0 ` { c1 }), (LSSum ` c5), (c0 ` { c1 }), (c0 ` { c3 }), w0)

blocks.name: lspsneu
blocks.content: Nonzero vectors with equal singleton spans have a unique proportionality constant. (Contributed by NM, 31-May-2015.)

blocks.name: lspexch
blocks.content: Exchange property for span of a pair. TODO: see if a version with Y,Z and X,Z reversed will shorten proofs (analogous to ~ lspexchn1 versus ~ lspexchn2 ); look for ~ lspexch and ~ prcom in same proof. TODO: would a hypothesis of ` -. X e. ( N `` { Z } ) ` instead of ` ( N `` { X } ) =/= ( N `` { Z } ) ` be better overall? This would be shorter and also satisfy the ` X =/= .0. ` condition. Here and also lspindp* and all proofs affected by them (all in NM's mathbox); there are 58 hypotheses with the ` =/= ` pattern as of 24-May-2015. (Contributed by NM, 11-Apr-2015.)

blocks.name: lspexchn1
blocks.content: Exchange property for span of a pair with negated membership. TODO: look at uses of ~ lspexch to see if this will shorten proofs. (Contributed by NM, 20-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lspexchn1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wn(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, cpr(c2, c3)))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(clspn, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, csn(c3)))))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c2, cfv(c1, cpr(c0, c3)))))
} = {
  mtand(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(c1, cpr(c2, c3))), wcel(c2, cfv(c1, cpr(c0, c3))))
  lspexch(c2, c1, c0, c3, c4, c5, cfv(c0g, c5), wa(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(c1, cpr(c2, c3)))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(c1, cpr(c2, c3))), wcel(c5, clvec))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(c1, cpr(c2, c3))), wcel(c0, cdif(c4, csn(cfv(c0g, c5)))))
  lssneln0(c0, c4, cfv(c0g, c5), c5, cfv(clss, c5), cfv(c1, csn(c3)), w0)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c5))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cfv(c1, csn(c3)), cfv(clss, c5)), wcel(c5, clmod), wcel(c3, c4))
  lspsncl(c5, c3, c4, c1, cfv(clss, c5))
  eqid(cfv(clss, c5))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(c1, cpr(c2, c3))), wcel(c2, c4))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(c1, cpr(c2, c3))), wcel(c3, c4))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(c1, cpr(c2, c3))), wne(cfv(c1, csn(c0)), cfv(c1, csn(c3))))
  lspsnne2(c1, c0, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c5, clmod), wcel(c5, clvec))
  lveclmod(c5)
  simpr(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(c1, cpr(c2, c3))))
}

thm lspexchn1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ¬ c0 ∈(c1 ` { c2, c3 }))
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c5)
  ⊣ c1 =(LSpan ` c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ LVec)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → ¬ c0 ∈(c1 ` { c3 }))
  ⊣ (w0 → ¬ c2 ∈(c1 ` { c0, c3 }))
} = {
  mtand(w0, c0 ∈(c1 ` { c2, c3 }), c2 ∈(c1 ` { c0, c3 }))
  lspexch(c2, c1, c0, c3, c4, c5, (0 ` c5), (w0 ∧ c0 ∈(c1 ` { c2, c3 })))
  adantr(w0, c0 ∈(c1 ` { c2, c3 }), c5 ∈ LVec)
  adantr(w0, c0 ∈(c1 ` { c2, c3 }), c0 ∈(c4 \ {(0 ` c5)}))
  lssneln0(c0, c4, (0 ` c5), c5, (LSubSp ` c5), (c1 ` { c3 }), w0)
  eqid((0 ` c5))
  syl2anc(w0, (c1 ` { c3 })∈(LSubSp ` c5), c5 ∈ LMod, c3 ∈ c4)
  lspsncl(c5, c3, c4, c1, (LSubSp ` c5))
  eqid((LSubSp ` c5))
  adantr(w0, c0 ∈(c1 ` { c2, c3 }), c2 ∈ c4)
  adantr(w0, c0 ∈(c1 ` { c2, c3 }), c3 ∈ c4)
  adantr(w0, c0 ∈(c1 ` { c2, c3 }), (c1 ` { c0 })≠(c1 ` { c3 }))
  lspsnne2(c1, c0, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  syl(w0, c5 ∈ LMod, c5 ∈ LVec)
  lveclmod(c5)
  simpr(w0, c0 ∈(c1 ` { c2, c3 }))
}

blocks.name: lspexchn2
blocks.content: Exchange property for span of a pair with negated membership. TODO: look at uses of ~ lspexch to see if this will shorten proofs. (Contributed by NM, 24-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lspexchn2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wn(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, cpr(c2, c3)))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(clspn, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, csn(c2)))))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c3, cfv(c1, cpr(c2, c0)))))
} = {
  sylnib(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(c1, cpr(c2, c3))), wcel(c0, cfv(c1, cpr(c3, c2))))
  lspexchn1(c0, c1, c3, c2, c4, c5, w0)
  sylnib(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(c1, cpr(c0, c2))), wcel(c3, cfv(c1, cpr(c2, c0))))
  eleq2i(c3, cfv(c1, cpr(c2, c0)), cfv(c1, cpr(c0, c2)))
  fveq2i(c1, cpr(c2, c0), cpr(c0, c2))
  prcom(c2, c0)
  eleq2i(c0, cfv(c1, cpr(c3, c2)), cfv(c1, cpr(c2, c3)))
  fveq2i(c1, cpr(c3, c2), cpr(c2, c3))
  prcom(c3, c2)
}

thm lspexchn2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ¬ c0 ∈(c1 ` { c2, c3 }))
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c5)
  ⊣ c1 =(LSpan ` c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ LVec)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → ¬ c0 ∈(c1 ` { c2 }))
  ⊣ (w0 → ¬ c3 ∈(c1 ` { c2, c0 }))
} = {
  sylnib(w0, c0 ∈(c1 ` { c2, c3 }), c0 ∈(c1 ` { c3, c2 }))
  lspexchn1(c0, c1, c3, c2, c4, c5, w0)
  sylnib(w0, c3 ∈(c1 ` { c0, c2 }), c3 ∈(c1 ` { c2, c0 }))
  eleq2i(c3, (c1 ` { c2, c0 }), (c1 ` { c0, c2 }))
  fveq2i(c1, { c2, c0 }, { c0, c2 })
  prcom(c2, c0)
  eleq2i(c0, (c1 ` { c3, c2 }), (c1 ` { c2, c3 }))
  fveq2i(c1, { c3, c2 }, { c2, c3 })
  prcom(c3, c2)

blocks.name: lspindpi
blocks.content: Partial independence property. (Contributed by NM, 23-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lspindpi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wne(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c2))), wne(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c3)))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(clspn, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c1, cfv(c0, cpr(c2, c3)))))
} = {
  jca(w0, wne(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c2))), wne(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c3))))
  mpd(w0, wne(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c2))), wn(wcel(c1, cfv(c0, cpr(c2, c3)))))
  necon3bd(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c2)), w0, wcel(c1, cfv(c0, cpr(c2, c3))))
  sylibrd(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c2))), wcel(c1, cfv(c0, cpr(c2, c3))), wss(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, cpr(c2, c3))))
  syl5ibrcom(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c2))), wss(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, cpr(c2, c3))), wss(cfv(c0, csn(c2)), cfv(c0, cpr(c2, c3))))
  sseqtr4d(cfv(c0, csn(c2)), cfv(c0, cpr(c2, c3)), co(cfv(c0, csn(c2)), cfv(clsm, c5), cfv(c0, csn(c3))), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wss(cfv(c0, csn(c2)), co(cfv(c0, csn(c2)), cfv(clsm, c5), cfv(c0, csn(c3)))), wcel(cfv(c0, csn(c2)), cfv(csubg, c5)), wcel(cfv(c0, csn(c3)), cfv(csubg, c5)))
  lsmub1(cfv(c0, csn(c2)), c5, cfv(c0, csn(c3)), cfv(clsm, c5))
  sseq1(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c2)), cfv(c0, cpr(c2, c3)))
  mpd(w0, wne(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c3))), wn(wcel(c1, cfv(c0, cpr(c2, c3)))))
  necon3bd(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c3)), w0, wcel(c1, cfv(c0, cpr(c2, c3))))
  sylibrd(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c3))), wcel(c1, cfv(c0, cpr(c2, c3))), wss(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, cpr(c2, c3))))
  syl5ibrcom(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c3))), wss(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, cpr(c2, c3))), wss(cfv(c0, csn(c3)), cfv(c0, cpr(c2, c3))))
  sseqtr4d(cfv(c0, csn(c3)), cfv(c0, cpr(c2, c3)), co(cfv(c0, csn(c2)), cfv(clsm, c5), cfv(c0, csn(c3))), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wss(cfv(c0, csn(c3)), co(cfv(c0, csn(c2)), cfv(clsm, c5), cfv(c0, csn(c3)))), wcel(cfv(c0, csn(c2)), cfv(csubg, c5)), wcel(cfv(c0, csn(c3)), cfv(csubg, c5)))
  sseldd(cfv(c0, csn(c2)), cfv(csubg, c5), cfv(clss, c5), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, csn(c2)), cfv(clss, c5)), wcel(c5, clmod), wcel(c2, c4))
  lspsncl(c5, c2, c4, c0, cfv(clss, c5))
  sseldd(cfv(c0, csn(c3)), cfv(csubg, c5), cfv(clss, c5), w0)
  syl(w0, wss(cfv(clss, c5), cfv(csubg, c5)), wcel(c5, clmod))
  lsssssubg(c5, cfv(clss, c5))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, csn(c3)), cfv(clss, c5)), wcel(c5, clmod), wcel(c3, c4))
  lspsncl(c5, c3, c4, c0, cfv(clss, c5))
  lsmub2(cfv(c0, csn(c2)), c5, cfv(c0, csn(c3)), cfv(clsm, c5))
  lsmpr(c0, c2, c3, cfv(clsm, c5), c4, c5, w0)
  eqid(cfv(clsm, c5))
  sseq1(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c3)), cfv(c0, cpr(c2, c3)))
  lspsnel5(c1, cfv(c0, cpr(c2, c3)), c0, c4, c5, cfv(clss, c5), w0)
  lspprcl(c0, c2, c3, cfv(clss, c5), c4, c5, w0)
  eqid(cfv(clss, c5))
  syl(w0, wcel(c5, clmod), wcel(c5, clvec))
  lveclmod(c5)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lspindpi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0 ` { c1 })≠(c0 ` { c2 })∧(c0 ` { c1 })≠(c0 ` { c3 })))
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c5)
  ⊣ c0 =(LSpan ` c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ LVec)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → ¬ c1 ∈(c0 ` { c2, c3 }))
} = {
  jca(w0, (c0 ` { c1 })≠(c0 ` { c2 }), (c0 ` { c1 })≠(c0 ` { c3 }))
  mpd(w0, (c0 ` { c1 })≠(c0 ` { c2 }), ¬ c1 ∈(c0 ` { c2, c3 }))
  necon3bd((c0 ` { c1 }), (c0 ` { c2 }), w0, c1 ∈(c0 ` { c2, c3 }))
  sylibrd(w0, (c0 ` { c1 })=(c0 ` { c2 }), c1 ∈(c0 ` { c2, c3 }), (c0 ` { c1 })⊆(c0 ` { c2, c3 }))
  syl5ibrcom(w0, (c0 ` { c1 })=(c0 ` { c2 }), (c0 ` { c1 })⊆(c0 ` { c2, c3 }), (c0 ` { c2 })⊆(c0 ` { c2, c3 }))
  sseqtr4d((c0 ` { c2 }), (c0 ` { c2, c3 }), ((c0 ` { c2 })[(LSSum ` c5)](c0 ` { c3 })), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ` { c2 })⊆((c0 ` { c2 })[(LSSum ` c5)](c0 ` { c3 })), (c0 ` { c2 })∈(SubGrp ` c5), (c0 ` { c3 })∈(SubGrp ` c5))
  lsmub1((c0 ` { c2 }), c5, (c0 ` { c3 }), (LSSum ` c5))
  sseq1((c0 ` { c1 }), (c0 ` { c2 }), (c0 ` { c2, c3 }))
  mpd(w0, (c0 ` { c1 })≠(c0 ` { c3 }), ¬ c1 ∈(c0 ` { c2, c3 }))
  necon3bd((c0 ` { c1 }), (c0 ` { c3 }), w0, c1 ∈(c0 ` { c2, c3 }))
  sylibrd(w0, (c0 ` { c1 })=(c0 ` { c3 }), c1 ∈(c0 ` { c2, c3 }), (c0 ` { c1 })⊆(c0 ` { c2, c3 }))
  syl5ibrcom(w0, (c0 ` { c1 })=(c0 ` { c3 }), (c0 ` { c1 })⊆(c0 ` { c2, c3 }), (c0 ` { c3 })⊆(c0 ` { c2, c3 }))
  sseqtr4d((c0 ` { c3 }), (c0 ` { c2, c3 }), ((c0 ` { c2 })[(LSSum ` c5)](c0 ` { c3 })), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ` { c3 })⊆((c0 ` { c2 })[(LSSum ` c5)](c0 ` { c3 })), (c0 ` { c2 })∈(SubGrp ` c5), (c0 ` { c3 })∈(SubGrp ` c5))
  sseldd((c0 ` { c2 }), (SubGrp ` c5), (LSubSp ` c5), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ` { c2 })∈(LSubSp ` c5), c5 ∈ LMod, c2 ∈ c4)
  lspsncl(c5, c2, c4, c0, (LSubSp ` c5))
  sseldd((c0 ` { c3 }), (SubGrp ` c5), (LSubSp ` c5), w0)
  syl(w0, (LSubSp ` c5)⊆(SubGrp ` c5), c5 ∈ LMod)
  lsssssubg(c5, (LSubSp ` c5))
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ` { c3 })∈(LSubSp ` c5), c5 ∈ LMod, c3 ∈ c4)
  lspsncl(c5, c3, c4, c0, (LSubSp ` c5))
  lsmub2((c0 ` { c2 }), c5, (c0 ` { c3 }), (LSSum ` c5))
  lsmpr(c0, c2, c3, (LSSum ` c5), c4, c5, w0)
  eqid((LSSum ` c5))
  sseq1((c0 ` { c1 }), (c0 ` { c3 }), (c0 ` { c2, c3 }))
  lspsnel5(c1, (c0 ` { c2, c3 }), c0, c4, c5, (LSubSp ` c5), w0)
  lspprcl(c0, c2, c3, (LSubSp ` c5), c4, c5, w0)
  eqid((LSubSp ` c5))
  syl(w0, c5 ∈ LMod, c5 ∈ LVec)
  lveclmod(c5)
}

blocks.name: lspindp1
blocks.content: Alternate way to say 3 vectors are mutually independent (swap 1st and 2nd). (Contributed by NM, 11-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lspindp1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wne(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c2))), wn(wcel(c3, cfv(c0, cpr(c1, c2))))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(c0g, c5))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(clspn, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c6))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wne(cfv(c0, csn(c3)), cfv(c0, csn(c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c1, cfv(c0, cpr(c3, c2)))))
} = {
  jca(w0, wne(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c2))), wn(wcel(c3, cfv(c0, cpr(c1, c2)))))
  simprd(w0, wne(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c2))), wne(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c3))))
  lspindpi(c0, c1, c3, c2, c4, c5, w0)
  eldifad(c3, c4, csn(c6), w0)
  mtand(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(c0, cpr(c1, c2))), wcel(c1, cfv(c0, cpr(c3, c2))))
  lspexch(c1, c0, c3, c2, c4, c5, c6, wa(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(c0, cpr(c1, c2)))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(c0, cpr(c1, c2))), wcel(c5, clvec))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(c0, cpr(c1, c2))), wcel(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c6))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(c0, cpr(c1, c2))), wcel(c1, c4))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(c0, cpr(c1, c2))), wcel(c2, c4))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(c0, cpr(c1, c2))), wne(cfv(c0, csn(c3)), cfv(c0, csn(c2))))
  simpr(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(c0, cpr(c1, c2))))
}

blocks.name: lspindp2l
blocks.content: Alternate way to say 3 vectors are mutually independent (rotate left). (Contributed by NM, 10-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lspindp2l(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wne(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c2))), wn(wcel(c3, cfv(c0, cpr(c1, c2))))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(c0g, c5))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(clspn, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c6))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wne(cfv(c0, csn(c3)), cfv(c0, csn(c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c2, cfv(c0, cpr(c3, c1)))))
} = {
  jca(w0, wne(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c2))), wn(wcel(c3, cfv(c0, cpr(c1, c2)))))
  necomd(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c2)), w0)
  simpld(w0, wne(cfv(c0, csn(c2)), cfv(c0, csn(c1))), wn(wcel(c3, cfv(c0, cpr(c2, c1)))))
  sylnib(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(c0, cpr(c1, c2))), wcel(c3, cfv(c0, cpr(c2, c1))))
  simprd(w0, wn(wcel(c3, cfv(c0, cpr(c2, c1)))), wne(cfv(c0, csn(c2)), cfv(c0, csn(c1))))
  lspindp1(c0, c2, c1, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  eleq2i(c3, cfv(c0, cpr(c2, c1)), cfv(c0, cpr(c1, c2)))
  fveq2i(c0, cpr(c2, c1), cpr(c1, c2))
  prcom(c2, c1)
}

blocks.name: lspindp2
blocks.content: Alternate way to say 3 vectors are mutually independent (rotate right). (Contributed by NM, 12-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lspindp2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wne(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c2))), wn(wcel(c3, cfv(c0, cpr(c1, c2))))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(c0g, c5))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(clspn, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c6))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wne(cfv(c0, csn(c2)), cfv(c0, csn(c3))))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c1, cfv(c0, cpr(c2, c3)))))
} = {
  lspindp1(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  necomd(cfv(c0, csn(c3)), cfv(c0, csn(c2)), w0)
  sylnib(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(c0, cpr(c3, c2))), wcel(c1, cfv(c0, cpr(c2, c3))))
  eleq2i(c1, cfv(c0, cpr(c2, c3)), cfv(c0, cpr(c3, c2)))
  fveq2i(c0, cpr(c2, c3), cpr(c3, c2))
  prcom(c2, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lspindp2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0 ` { c1 })≠(c0 ` { c2 })∧ ¬ c3 ∈(c0 ` { c1, c2 })))
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c5)
  ⊣ c6 =(0 ` c5)
  ⊣ c0 =(LSpan ` c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ LVec)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈(c4 \ { c6 }))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 ` { c2 })≠(c0 ` { c3 }))
  ⊣ (w0 → ¬ c1 ∈(c0 ` { c2, c3 }))
} = {
  lspindp1(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  necomd((c0 ` { c3 }), (c0 ` { c2 }), w0)
  sylnib(w0, c1 ∈(c0 ` { c3, c2 }), c1 ∈(c0 ` { c2, c3 }))
  eleq2i(c1, (c0 ` { c2, c3 }), (c0 ` { c3, c2 }))
  fveq2i(c0, { c2, c3 }, { c3, c2 })
  prcom(c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: lspindp3
blocks.content: Independence of 2 vectors is preserved by vector sum. (Contributed by NM, 26-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lspindp3(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wne(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(co(c1, c2, c3)))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cplusg, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(c0g, c5))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(clspn, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c6))))
  -| wi(w0, wne(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c3))))
} = {
  mpd(w0, wne(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(co(c1, c2, c3)))), wne(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c3))))
  necon3d(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c3)), cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(co(c1, c2, c3))), w0)
  ex(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(co(c1, c2, c3)))), wceq(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c3))))
  lspabs2(c0, c1, c3, c4, c5, c2, c6, wa(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(co(c1, c2, c3))))))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(co(c1, c2, c3)))), wcel(c5, clvec))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(co(c1, c2, c3)))), wcel(c1, c4))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(co(c1, c2, c3)))), wcel(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c6))))
  simpr(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(co(c1, c2, c3)))))
}

blocks.name: lspindp4
blocks.content: (Partial) independence of 3 vectors is preserved by vector sum. (Contributed by NM, 26-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lspindp4(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wn(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, cpr(c2, co(c2, c3, c4))))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cplusg, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(clspn, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, clmod))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, cpr(c2, c4)))))
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wn(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, cpr(c2, co(c2, c3, c4)))))), wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5)))
  neleqtrrd(c0, cfv(c1, cpr(c2, co(c2, c3, c4))), cfv(c1, cpr(c2, c4)), w0)
  lspprabs(c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lspindp4(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ¬ c0 ∈(c1 ` { c2,(c2[c3]c4)}))
  ⊣ c5 =(Base ` c6)
  ⊣ c3 =(+ ` c6)
  ⊣ c1 =(LSpan ` c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ LMod)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → ¬ c0 ∈(c1 ` { c2, c4 }))
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → ¬ c0 ∈(c1 ` { c2,(c2[c3]c4)})), (w0 → c0 ∈ c5))
  neleqtrrd(c0, (c1 ` { c2,(c2[c3]c4)}), (c1 ` { c2, c4 }), w0)
  lspprabs(c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
}

blocks.name: lvecindp
blocks.content: Compute the ` X ` coefficient in a sum with an independent vector ` X ` (first conjunct), which can then be removed to continue with the remaining vectors summed in expressions ` Y ` and ` Z ` (second conjunct). Typically, ` U ` is the span of the remaining vectors. (Contributed by NM, 5-Apr-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.) (Proof shortened by AV, 19-Jul-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm lvecindp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, class c10, class c11, class c12, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cplusg, c5))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(csca, c5))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(cbs, c7))
  -| wceq(c9, cfv(cvsca, c5))
  -| wceq(c10, cfv(clss, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c11, c10))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c12, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c12, c11)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c11))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c11))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, c9, c12), c6, c2), co(co(c1, c9, c12), c6, c3)))
} = {
  jca(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3))
  mpbid(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wceq(co(c0, c9, c12), co(c1, c9, c12)))
  subgdisj1(co(c0, c9, c12), co(c1, c9, c12), c6, c5, cfv(c0g, c5), cfv(ccntz, c5), cfv(cfv(clspn, c5), csn(c12)), c11, c2, c3, w0)
  lvecvscan2(c0, c9, c12, c1, c4, c5, c7, c8, cfv(c0g, c5), w0)
  lssvneln0(c12, cfv(c0g, c5), c5, c10, c11, w0)
  subgdisj2(c2, c3, c6, c5, cfv(c0g, c5), cfv(ccntz, c5), cfv(cfv(clspn, c5), csn(c12)), c11, co(c0, c9, c12), co(c1, c9, c12), w0)
  lspdisj(cfv(clspn, c5), c12, c11, cfv(c0g, c5), c4, c5, c10, w0)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c5))
  ablcntzd(cfv(cfv(clspn, c5), csn(c12)), cfv(ccntz, c5), c11, c5, w0)
  eqid(cfv(ccntz, c5))
  syl(w0, wcel(c5, cabl), wcel(c5, clmod))
  lmodabl(c5)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cfv(cfv(clspn, c5), csn(c12)), cfv(csubg, c5)), wcel(c5, clmod), wcel(c12, c4))
  lspsnsubg(c5, c12, c4, cfv(clspn, c5))
  sseldd(c11, cfv(csubg, c5), c10, w0)
  syl(w0, wss(c10, cfv(csubg, c5)), wcel(c5, clmod))
  lsssssubg(c5, c10)
  lspsneli(c0, c9, c12, cfv(clspn, c5), c4, c5, c7, c8, w0)
  lspsneli(c1, c9, c12, cfv(clspn, c5), c4, c5, c7, c8, w0)
  eqid(cfv(clspn, c5))
  syl(w0, wcel(c5, clmod), wcel(c5, clvec))
  lveclmod(c5)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lvecindp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, class c10, class c11, class c12, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c3))
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c5)
  ⊣ c6 =(+ ` c5)
  ⊣ c7 =(Scalar ` c5)
  ⊣ c8 =(Base ` c7)
  ⊣ c9 =(× ` c5)
  ⊣ c10 =(LSubSp ` c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ LVec)
  ⊣ (w0 → c11 ∈ c10)
  ⊣ (w0 → c12 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → ¬ c12 ∈ c11)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c11)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c11)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c8)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c8)
  ⊣ (w0 →((c0[c9]c12)[c6]c2)=((c1[c9]c12)[c6]c3))
} = {
  jca(w0, c0 = c1, c2 = c3)
  mpbid(w0, c0 = c1, (c0[c9]c12)=(c1[c9]c12))
  subgdisj1((c0[c9]c12), (c1[c9]c12), c6, c5, (0 ` c5), (Cntz ` c5), ((LSpan ` c5)` { c12 }), c11, c2, c3, w0)
  lvecvscan2(c0, c9, c12, c1, c4, c5, c7, c8, (0 ` c5), w0)
  lssvneln0(c12, (0 ` c5), c5, c10, c11, w0)
  subgdisj2(c2, c3, c6, c5, (0 ` c5), (Cntz ` c5), ((LSpan ` c5)` { c12 }), c11, (c0[c9]c12), (c1[c9]c12), w0)
  lspdisj((LSpan ` c5), c12, c11, (0 ` c5), c4, c5, c10, w0)
  eqid((0 ` c5))
  ablcntzd(((LSpan ` c5)` { c12 }), (Cntz ` c5), c11, c5, w0)
  eqid((Cntz ` c5))
  syl(w0, c5 ∈ Abel, c5 ∈ LMod)
  lmodabl(c5)
  syl2anc(w0, ((LSpan ` c5)` { c12 })∈(SubGrp ` c5), c5 ∈ LMod, c12 ∈ c4)
  lspsnsubg(c5, c12, c4, (LSpan ` c5))
  sseldd(c11, (SubGrp ` c5), c10, w0)
  syl(w0, c10 ⊆(SubGrp ` c5), c5 ∈ LMod)
  lsssssubg(c5, c10)
  lspsneli(c0, c9, c12, (LSpan ` c5), c4, c5, c7, c8, w0)
  lspsneli(c1, c9, c12, (LSpan ` c5), c4, c5, c7, c8, w0)
  eqid((LSpan ` c5))
  syl(w0, c5 ∈ LMod, c5 ∈ LVec)
  lveclmod(c5)
}

blocks.name: lvecindp2
blocks.content: Sums of independent vectors must have equal coefficients. (Contributed by NM, 22-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lvecindp2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, class c10, class c11, class c12, class c13, wff w0) {

  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cplusg, c5))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(csca, c5))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(cbs, c7))
  -| wceq(c9, cfv(cvsca, c5))
  -| wceq(c10, cfv(c0g, c5))
  -| wceq(c11, cfv(clspn, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c12, cdif(c4, csn(c10))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c13, cdif(c4, csn(c10))))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wne(cfv(c11, csn(c12)), cfv(c11, csn(c13))))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, c9, c12), c6, co(c2, c9, c13)), co(co(c1, c9, c12), c6, co(c3, c9, c13))))
} = {
  mpbid(w0, wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3)), wa(wceq(co(c0, c9, c12), co(c1, c9, c12)), wceq(co(c2, c9, c13), co(c3, c9, c13))))
  mpbid(w0, wa(wceq(co(c0, c9, c12), co(c1, c9, c12)), wceq(co(c2, c9, c13), co(c3, c9, c13))), wceq(co(co(c0, c9, c12), c6, co(c2, c9, c13)), co(co(c1, c9, c12), c6, co(c3, c9, c13))))
  subgdisjb(co(c0, c9, c12), c6, co(c2, c9, c13), co(c1, c9, c12), co(c3, c9, c13), c5, c10, cfv(ccntz, c5), cfv(c11, csn(c12)), cfv(c11, csn(c13)), w0)
  lspdisj2(c11, c12, c13, c10, c4, c5, w0)
  ablcntzd(cfv(c11, csn(c12)), cfv(ccntz, c5), cfv(c11, csn(c13)), c5, w0)
  eqid(cfv(ccntz, c5))
  syl(w0, wcel(c5, cabl), wcel(c5, clmod))
  lmodabl(c5)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cfv(c11, csn(c12)), cfv(csubg, c5)), wcel(c5, clmod), wcel(c12, c4))
  lspsnsubg(c5, c12, c4, c11)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cfv(c11, csn(c13)), cfv(csubg, c5)), wcel(c5, clmod), wcel(c13, c4))
  lspsnsubg(c5, c13, c4, c11)
  lspsneli(c0, c9, c12, c11, c4, c5, c7, c8, w0)
  lspsneli(c1, c9, c12, c11, c4, c5, c7, c8, w0)
  lspsneli(c2, c9, c13, c11, c4, c5, c7, c8, w0)
  lspsneli(c3, c9, c13, c11, c4, c5, c7, c8, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c5, clmod), wcel(c5, clvec))
  lveclmod(c5)
  anbi12d(w0, wceq(co(c0, c9, c12), co(c1, c9, c12)), wceq(co(c2, c9, c13), co(c3, c9, c13)), wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3))
  lvecvscan2(c0, c9, c12, c1, c4, c5, c7, c8, c10, w0)
  eldifad(c12, c4, csn(c10), w0)
  syl(w0, wne(c12, c10), wcel(c12, cdif(c4, csn(c10))))
  eldifsni(c12, c4, c10)
  lvecvscan2(c2, c9, c13, c3, c4, c5, c7, c8, c10, w0)
  eldifad(c13, c4, csn(c10), w0)
  syl(w0, wne(c13, c10), wcel(c13, cdif(c4, csn(c10))))
  eldifsni(c13, c4, c10)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lvecindp2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, class c10, class c11, class c12, class c13, wff w0) {

  mpbid(w0, ((c0[c9]c12)=(c1[c9]c12)∧(c2[c9]c13)=(c3[c9]c13)), ((c0[c9]c12)[c6](c2[c9]c13))=((c1[c9]c12)[c6](c3[c9]c13)))

  syl2anc(w0, (c11 ` { c13 })∈(SubGrp ` c5), c5 ∈ LMod, c13 ∈ c4)

  lspsneli(c0, c9, c12, c11, c4, c5, c7, c8, w0)
  lspsneli(c1, c9, c12, c11, c4, c5, c7, c8, w0)
  lspsneli(c2, c9, c13, c11, c4, c5, c7, c8, w0)

  lvecvscan2(c0, c9, c12, c1, c4, c5, c7, c8, c10, w0)

blocks.name: lspsnsubn0
blocks.content: Unequal singleton spans imply nonzero vector subtraction. (Contributed by NM, 19-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lspsnsubn0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wne(co(c0, c1, c2), c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(csg, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, clmod))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wne(cfv(c6, csn(c0)), cfv(c6, csn(c2))))

thm lspsnsubn0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[c1]c2)≠ c3)
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c5)
  ⊣ c3 =(0 ` c5)
  ⊣ c1 =(-g ` c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ LMod)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c6 ` { c0 })≠(c6 ` { c2 }))
} = {
  mpd(w0, (c0[c1]c2)≠ c3, (c6 ` { c0 })≠(c6 ` { c2 }))
  necon3d((c6 ` { c0 }), (c6 ` { c2 }), (c0[c1]c2), c3, w0)
  syl6bi(w0, (c0[c1]c2)= c3, (c6 ` { c0 })=(c6 ` { c2 }), c0 = c2)
  syl3anc(w0, ((c0[c1]c2)= c3 ↔ c0 = c2), c5 ∈ LMod, c0 ∈ c4, c2 ∈ c4)
  lmodsubeq0(c5, c0, c4, c2, c1, c3)
  fveq2d(c6, { c0 }, { c2 }, c0 = c2)
  sneq(c0, c2)
}

blocks.name: lsmcv
blocks.content: Subspace sum has the covering property (using spans of singletons to represent atoms). Similar to Exercise 5 of [Kalmbach] p. 153. ( ~ spansncvi analog.) TODO: ugly proof; can it be shortened? (Contributed by NM, 2-Oct-2014.)

blocks.name: lssacsex
blocks.content: In a vector space, subspaces form an algebraic closure system whose closure operator has the exchange property. Strengthening of ~ lssacs by ~ lspsolv . (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm lssacsex(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmrc, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  jca(wcel(c0, clvec), wcel(c1, cfv(cacs, c2)), wral(s0, cpw(c2), wral(s1, c2, wral(s2, cdif(cfv(c3, cun(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))), cfv(c3, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(c3, cun(cv(s0), csn(cv(s2)))))))))

  ralrimiva(s1, c2, wa(wcel(c0, clvec), wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c2))), wral(s2, cdif(cfv(c3, cun(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))), cfv(c3, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(c3, cun(cv(s0), csn(cv(s2)))))))

thm lssacsex(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ LVec →(c1 ∈(ACS ` c2)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ P(c2), ∀(s1 ∈ c2, ∀(s2 ∈((c3 `(s0 ⋃ { s1 }))\(c3 ` s0)), s1 ∈(c3 `(s0 ⋃ { s2 })))))))
  ⊣ c1 =(LSubSp ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(mrCls ` c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
} = {
  jca(c0 ∈ LVec, c1 ∈(ACS ` c2), ∀(s0 ∈ P(c2), ∀(s1 ∈ c2, ∀(s2 ∈((c3 `(s0 ⋃ { s1 }))\(c3 ` s0)), s1 ∈(c3 `(s0 ⋃ { s2 }))))))
  syl(c0 ∈ LVec, c1 ∈(ACS ` c2), c0 ∈ LMod)
  lssacs(c0, c1, c2)
  ralrimiva(s0, P(c2), c0 ∈ LVec, ∀(s1 ∈ c2, ∀(s2 ∈((c3 `(s0 ⋃ { s1 }))\(c3 ` s0)), s1 ∈(c3 `(s0 ⋃ { s2 })))))
  ralrimiva(s1, c2, (c0 ∈ LVec ∧ s0 ∈ P(c2)), ∀(s2 ∈((c3 `(s0 ⋃ { s1 }))\(c3 ` s0)), s1 ∈(c3 `(s0 ⋃ { s2 }))))
  ralrimiva(s2, ((c3 `(s0 ⋃ { s1 }))\(c3 ` s0)), ((c0 ∈ LVec ∧ s0 ∈ P(c2))∧ s1 ∈ c2), s1 ∈(c3 `(s0 ⋃ { s2 })))
  eleqtrd(s1, (c3 `(s0 ⋃ { s2 })), ((LSpan ` c0)`(s0 ⋃ { s2 })), (((c0 ∈ LVec ∧ s0 ∈ P(c2))∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧ s2 ∈((c3 `(s0 ⋃ { s1 }))\(c3 ` s0))))
  syl13anc((((c0 ∈ LVec ∧ s0 ∈ P(c2))∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧ s2 ∈((c3 `(s0 ⋃ { s1 }))\(c3 ` s0))), s1 ∈((LSpan ` c0)`(s0 ⋃ { s2 })), c0 ∈ LVec, s0 ⊆ c2, s1 ∈ c2, s2 ∈(((LSpan ` c0)`(s0 ⋃ { s1 }))\((LSpan ` c0)` s0)))
  elpwid(s0, c2, (((c0 ∈ LVec ∧ s0 ∈ P(c2))∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧ s2 ∈((c3 `(s0 ⋃ { s1 }))\(c3 ` s0))))
  simpllr(c0 ∈ LVec, s0 ∈ P(c2), s1 ∈ c2, s2 ∈((c3 `(s0 ⋃ { s1 }))\(c3 ` s0)))
  simplr((c0 ∈ LVec ∧ s0 ∈ P(c2)), s1 ∈ c2, s2 ∈((c3 `(s0 ⋃ { s1 }))\(c3 ` s0)))
  eleqtrrd(s2, (((LSpan ` c0)`(s0 ⋃ { s1 }))\((LSpan ` c0)` s0)), ((c3 `(s0 ⋃ { s1 }))\(c3 ` s0)), (((c0 ∈ LVec ∧ s0 ∈ P(c2))∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧ s2 ∈((c3 `(s0 ⋃ { s1 }))\(c3 ` s0))))
  simpr(((c0 ∈ LVec ∧ s0 ∈ P(c2))∧ s1 ∈ c2), s2 ∈((c3 `(s0 ⋃ { s1 }))\(c3 ` s0)))
  difeq12d(((LSpan ` c0)`(s0 ⋃ { s1 })), ((LSpan ` c0)` s0), (c3 `(s0 ⋃ { s1 })), (c3 ` s0), (((c0 ∈ LVec ∧ s0 ∈ P(c2))∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧ s2 ∈((c3 `(s0 ⋃ { s1 }))\(c3 ` s0))))
  fveq1d((LSpan ` c0), (s0 ⋃ { s1 }), c3, (((c0 ∈ LVec ∧ s0 ∈ P(c2))∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧ s2 ∈((c3 `(s0 ⋃ { s1 }))\(c3 ` s0))))
  fveq1d((LSpan ` c0), s0, c3, (((c0 ∈ LVec ∧ s0 ∈ P(c2))∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧ s2 ∈((c3 `(s0 ⋃ { s1 }))\(c3 ` s0))))

  simplll(c0 ∈ LVec, s0 ∈ P(c2), s1 ∈ c2, s2 ∈((c3 `(s0 ⋃ { s1 }))\(c3 ` s0)))

  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)

blocks.name: lspsnat
blocks.content: There is no subspace strictly between the zero subspace and the span of a vector (i.e. a 1-dimensional subspace is an atom). ( ~ h1datomi analog.) (Contributed by NM, 20-Apr-2014.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jun-2014.)

  -| wceq(c6, cfv(c0g, c0))

  syl5bi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, clvec), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4)), wss(c1, cfv(c5, csn(c3)))), wne(cdif(c1, csn(c6)), emptycls), wceq(c1, cfv(c5, csn(c3))), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(c6)))))

  eleqtrrd(cv(hs0), cdif(cfv(c5, cun(emptycls, csn(c3))), cfv(c5, emptycls)), cdif(cfv(c5, csn(c3)), csn(c6)), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, clvec), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4)), wa(wss(c1, cfv(c5, csn(c3))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(c6))))))

blocks.name: lspsncv0
blocks.content: The span of a singleton covers the zero subspace, using Definition 3.2.18 of [PtakPulmannova] p. 68 for "covers".) (Contributed by NM, 12-Aug-2014.) (Revised by AV, 13-Jul-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm lspsncv0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wn(wrex(s0, c0, wa(wpss(csn(c1), cv(s0)), wpss(cv(s0), cfv(c2, csn(c3)))))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(c0g, c5))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(clss, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clspn, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  sylib(w0, wn(wrex(s0, c0, wa(wpss(csn(c1), cv(s0)), wpss(cv(s0), cfv(c2, csn(c3)))))), wral(s0, c0, wi(wpss(csn(c1), cv(s0)), wn(wpss(cv(s0), cfv(c2, csn(c3)))))))

blocks.name: lsppratlem1
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ lspprat . Let ` x e. ( U \ { 0 } ) ` (if there is no such ` x ` then ` U ` is the zero subspace), and let ` y e. ( U \ ( N `` { x } ) ) ` (assuming the conclusion is false). The goal is to write ` X ` , ` Y ` in terms of ` x ` , ` y ` , which would normally be done by solving the system of linear equations. The span equivalent of this process is ~ lspsolv (hence the name), which we use extensively below. In this lemma, we show that since ` x e. ( N `` { X , Y } ) ` , either ` x e. ( N `` { Y } ) ` or ` X e. ( N `` { x , Y } ) ` . (Contributed by NM, 29-Aug-2014.)

blocks.name: islbs2
blocks.content: An equivalent formulation of the basis predicate in a vector space: a subset is a basis iff no element is in the span of the rest of the set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jan-2015.)

blocks.name: lbsacsbs
blocks.content: Being a basis in a vector space is equivalent to being a basis in the associated algebraic closure system. Equivalent to ~ islbs2 . (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm lbsacsbs(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, clvec), wb(wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, c3), wceq(cfv(c4, c1), c5))))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(clss, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cmrc, c6))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmri, c6))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clbs, c0))
} = {
  3bitrd(wcel(c0, clvec), wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, c3), wceq(cfv(c4, c1), c5)), w3a(wss(c1, c5), wceq(cfv(cfv(clspn, c0), c1), c5), wral(hs0, c1, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(clspn, c0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))))))), w3a(wss(c1, c5), wceq(cfv(c4, c1), c5), wral(hs0, c1, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))))))))
  islbs2(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c5, cfv(clspn, c0))
  3anbi23d(wcel(c0, clvec), wss(c1, c5), wceq(cfv(cfv(clspn, c0), c1), c5), wral(hs0, c1, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(clspn, c0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))))))), wceq(cfv(c4, c1), c5), wral(hs0, c1, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))))))))
  eqeq1d(cfv(cfv(clspn, c0), c1), c5, cfv(c4, c1), wcel(c0, clvec))
  fveq1d(cfv(clspn, c0), c1, c4, wcel(c0, clvec))
  ralbidv(hs0, c1, wcel(c0, clvec), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(clspn, c0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))))), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))))))
  notbid(wcel(c0, clvec), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(clspn, c0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))))))

  fveq1d(cfv(clspn, c0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), c4, wcel(c0, clvec))
  syl(wcel(c0, clvec), wceq(cfv(clspn, c0), c4), wcel(c0, clmod))
  mrclsp(c0, cfv(clspn, c0), c4, c6)
  eqid(cfv(clspn, c0))
  syl6rbbr(wcel(c0, clvec), w3a(wss(c1, c5), wceq(cfv(c4, c1), c5), wral(hs0, c1, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))))))), wa(wcel(c1, c3), wceq(cfv(c4, c1), c5)), wa(wa(wss(c1, c5), wral(hs0, c1, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))))))), wceq(cfv(c4, c1), c5)))

  3syl(wcel(c0, clvec), wb(wcel(c1, c3), wa(wss(c1, c5), wral(hs0, c1, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))))))))), wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c6, cfv(cmre, c5)))

blocks.pretty:
thm lbsacsbs(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ LVec →(c1 ∈ c2 ↔(c1 ∈ c3 ∧(c4 ` c1)= c5)))
  ⊣ c6 =(LSubSp ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(mrCls ` c6)
  ⊣ c5 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(mrInd ` c6)
  ⊣ c2 =(LBasis ` c0)
} = {
  3bitrd(c0 ∈ LVec, c1 ∈ c2, (c1 ∈ c3 ∧(c4 ` c1)= c5), (c1 ⊆ c5 ∧((LSpan ` c0)` c1)= c5 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ¬ hs0 ∈((LSpan ` c0)`(c1 \ { hs0 })))), (c1 ⊆ c5 ∧(c4 ` c1)= c5 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ¬ hs0 ∈(c4 `(c1 \ { hs0 })))))
  islbs2(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c5, (LSpan ` c0))
  3anbi23d(c0 ∈ LVec, c1 ⊆ c5, ((LSpan ` c0)` c1)= c5, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ¬ hs0 ∈((LSpan ` c0)`(c1 \ { hs0 }))), (c4 ` c1)= c5, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ¬ hs0 ∈(c4 `(c1 \ { hs0 }))))
  eqeq1d(((LSpan ` c0)` c1), c5, (c4 ` c1), c0 ∈ LVec)
  fveq1d((LSpan ` c0), c1, c4, c0 ∈ LVec)
  ralbidv(hs0, c1, c0 ∈ LVec, ¬ hs0 ∈((LSpan ` c0)`(c1 \ { hs0 })), ¬ hs0 ∈(c4 `(c1 \ { hs0 })))
  notbid(c0 ∈ LVec, hs0 ∈((LSpan ` c0)`(c1 \ { hs0 })), hs0 ∈(c4 `(c1 \ { hs0 })))
  eleq2d(hs0, ((LSpan ` c0)`(c1 \ { hs0 })), (c4 `(c1 \ { hs0 })), c0 ∈ LVec)
  fveq1d((LSpan ` c0), (c1 \ { hs0 }), c4, c0 ∈ LVec)
  syl(c0 ∈ LVec, (LSpan ` c0)= c4, c0 ∈ LMod)
  mrclsp(c0, (LSpan ` c0), c4, c6)
  eqid((LSpan ` c0))
  syl6rbbr(c0 ∈ LVec, (c1 ⊆ c5 ∧(c4 ` c1)= c5 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ¬ hs0 ∈(c4 `(c1 \ { hs0 })))), (c1 ∈ c3 ∧(c4 ` c1)= c5), ((c1 ⊆ c5 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ¬ hs0 ∈(c4 `(c1 \ { hs0 }))))∧(c4 ` c1)= c5))
  anbi1d(c0 ∈ LVec, c1 ∈ c3, (c4 ` c1)= c5, (c1 ⊆ c5 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ¬ hs0 ∈(c4 `(c1 \ { hs0 })))))
  3syl(c0 ∈ LVec, (c1 ∈ c3 ↔(c1 ⊆ c5 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ¬ hs0 ∈(c4 `(c1 \ { hs0 }))))), c0 ∈ LMod, c6 ∈(Moore ` c5))
  lveclmod(c0)
  lssmre(c0, c6, c5)
  ismri(hs0, c6, c5, c1, c3, c4)
  3anan32(c1 ⊆ c5, (c4 ` c1)= c5, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ¬ hs0 ∈(c4 `(c1 \ { hs0 }))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c((LSpan ` c0))
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ LVec)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
}

blocks.name: lvecdim
blocks.content: The dimension theorem for vector spaces: any two bases of the same vector space are equinumerous. Proven by using ~ lssacsex and ~ lbsacsbs to show that being a basis for a vector space is equivalent to being a basis for the associated algebraic closure system, and then using ~ acsexdimd . (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm lvecdim(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, clvec), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c1, cen, c3))

} = {

blocks.name: lbsextlem2
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ lbsext . Since ` A ` is a chain (actually, we only need it to be closed under binary union), the union ` T ` of the spans of each individual element of ` A ` is a subspace, and it contains all of ` U. A ` (except for our target vector ` x ` - we are trying to make ` x ` a linear combination of all the other vectors in some set from ` A ` ). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Jun-2014.)

blocks.name: lbsextlem4
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ lbsext . ~ lbsextlem3 satisfies the conditions for the application of Zorn's lemma ~ zorn (thus invoking AC), and so there is a maximal linearly independent set extending ` C ` . Here we prove that such a set is a basis. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: lbsextg
blocks.content: For any linearly independent subset ` C ` of ` V ` , there is a basis containing the vectors in ` C ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-May-2015.)

blocks.name: lbsext
blocks.content: For any linearly independent subset ` C ` of ` V ` , there is a basis containing the vectors in ` C ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Jun-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lbsext(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, clvec), wss(c1, c2), wral(s0, c1, wn(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(c3, cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0)))))))), wrex(s1, c4, wss(c1, cv(s1))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(clbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(clspn, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  syl3an1(wcel(c0, clvec), wss(c1, c2), wral(s0, c1, wn(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(c3, cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0))))))), wrex(s1, c4, wss(c1, cv(s1))), wa(wcel(c0, clvec), wcel(cpw(c2), cdm(ccrd))))
  jctr(wcel(c0, clvec), wcel(cpw(c2), cdm(ccrd)))
  ax-mp(wcel(cpw(c2), cdm(ccrd)), wcel(cpw(c2), universe))
  pwex(c2)
  fvexi(c2, cbs, c0)
  numth3(cpw(c2), universe)
  lbsextg(s0, s1, c0, c2, c1, c3, c4)
}

  jctr(c0 ∈ LVec, P(c2)∈ dom(card))

  0ss(cfv(cbs, c0))

blocks.name: lvecprop2d
blocks.content: If two structures have the same components (properties), one is a left vector space iff the other one is. This version of ~ lvecpropd also breaks up the components of the scalar ring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Jun-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lvecprop2d(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, clvec), wcel(c1, clvec)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(csca, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(csca, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c4)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(cv(s1), c5))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c3), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c4), cv(s1))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(cv(s1), c5))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c3), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c4), cv(s1))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cvsca, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cvsca, c1), cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, wcel(c0, clvec), wcel(c1, clvec), wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c3, cdr)), wa(wcel(c1, clmod), wcel(c4, cdr)))
  anbi12d(w0, wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c3, cdr), wcel(c1, clmod), wcel(c4, cdr))
  lmodprop2d(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  drngpropd(s0, s1, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  islvec(c0, c3)
  islvec(c1, c4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lvecprop2d(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ∈ LVec ↔ c1 ∈ LVec))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 =(Base ` c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 =(Base ` c1))
  ⊣ c3 =(Scalar ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(Scalar ` c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 =(Base ` c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 =(Base ` c4))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c2 ∧ s1 ∈ c2))→(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(s0[(+ ` c1)]s1))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c5 ∧ s1 ∈ c5))→(s0[(+ ` c3)]s1)=(s0[(+ ` c4)]s1))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c5 ∧ s1 ∈ c5))→(s0[(× ` c3)]s1)=(s0[(× ` c4)]s1))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c5 ∧ s1 ∈ c2))→(s0[(× ` c0)]s1)=(s0[(× ` c1)]s1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, c0 ∈ LVec, c1 ∈ LVec, (c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c3 ∈ DivRing), (c1 ∈ LMod ∧ c4 ∈ DivRing))
  anbi12d(w0, c0 ∈ LMod, c3 ∈ DivRing, c1 ∈ LMod, c4 ∈ DivRing)
  lmodprop2d(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  drngpropd(s0, s1, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  islvec(c0, c3)
  islvec(c1, c4)
}

  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1))))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c3, cfv(csca, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c3, cfv(csca, c1)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cvsca, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cvsca, c1), cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, wcel(c0, clvec), wcel(c1, clvec), wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), cdr)), wa(wcel(c1, clmod), wcel(cfv(csca, c1), cdr)))
  anbi12d(w0, wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), cdr), wcel(c1, clmod), wcel(cfv(csca, c1), cdr))
  lmodpropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  eleq1d(cfv(csca, c0), cdr, cfv(csca, c1), w0)
  eqtr3d(cfv(csca, c0), cfv(csca, c1), c3, w0)
  islvec(c0, cfv(csca, c0))
  eqid(cfv(csca, c0))
  islvec(c1, cfv(csca, c1))
  eqid(cfv(csca, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lvecpropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ∈ LVec ↔ c1 ∈ LVec))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 =(Base ` c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 =(Base ` c1))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c2 ∧ s1 ∈ c2))→(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(s0[(+ ` c1)]s1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 =(Scalar ` c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 =(Scalar ` c1))
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c3)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c4 ∧ s1 ∈ c2))→(s0[(× ` c0)]s1)=(s0[(× ` c1)]s1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, c0 ∈ LVec, c1 ∈ LVec, (c0 ∈ LMod ∧(Scalar ` c0)∈ DivRing), (c1 ∈ LMod ∧(Scalar ` c1)∈ DivRing))
  anbi12d(w0, c0 ∈ LMod, (Scalar ` c0)∈ DivRing, c1 ∈ LMod, (Scalar ` c1)∈ DivRing)
  lmodpropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  eleq1d((Scalar ` c0), cdr, (Scalar ` c1), w0)
  eqtr3d((Scalar ` c0), (Scalar ` c1), c3, w0)
  islvec(c0, (Scalar ` c0))
  eqid((Scalar ` c0))
  islvec(c1, (Scalar ` c1))
  eqid((Scalar ` c1))
}
